titleInfo.title: Bielefeld Academic Search Engine: a (Potential Information-)BASE for the Working Mathematician

mods.abstract: A modern search engine based approach to scientific information retrieval is described as the consequent next step after building up digital libraries. Bielefeld University Library has just established two demonstrators for possible retrieval services, one of them from mathematics.

titleInfo.title: New developments in electronic publishing of mathematics. Joint proceedings of the ECM 4 satellite conference on electronic publishing at KTH, Stockholm, Sweden, June 25--27, 2004 and the special session on electronic publications at the joint AMS-SMM international meeting, Houston, TX, USA, May 13, 2004
